verses.1: Judah kumpi Hezekiahʼ lai-atte in a teikhiat uh Solomonʼ paunak dangte:
verses.2: Pasian in thu a ip manin a min thang a, kumpite in thu a genkhiat manin minthang uh hi.
verses.3: Vantung sang lua-in lei sung a thuk luat mah bangin kumpipaʼ ngaihsutna thuk lua-in kithei zo lo hi.
verses.4: Ngun a ek teng paikhia lehang sikseek pa in na hoihpi piangsak thei hi.
verses.5: Kumpipa kiang pan migilote nil khia lehang thumanin ama ukna kip thei bek hi.
verses.6: Kumpipa mai ah na om ciangin mi lian kineih kei inla, mi lianteʼ tut nading munah tu kha kei in.
verses.7: Uliante a awn dingin hua lai ah va tu suk in, hong kicih sangin hih lai ah hong tu to in, hong kicih ding hoih zaw hi.
verses.8: Thu khatpeuh na theih ciangin thukhen zum tun pah kei in. Na veengpa in nangʼ khialhna hong lak telkik leh nang bang lawh nawn ding na hi hiam?
verses.9: Na thu neih pih na veengpa bek mah tawh thu kiseel inla, mi khatʼ thusim midangʼ tungah genthang kei in.
verses.10: Tua hikeileh amah hehin nang hong maizumsak dinga, na min siatna bei ngei nawn lo ding hi.
verses.11: A kilawm hunin kammal khat pau khiatna pen ngun pek tunga kham pek khat a kisuang tawh kibang hi.
verses.12: Hilhna a sang thei mipa adingin a pil thuhilhpa pen kizepna kham bilbah tawh kibang hi.
verses.13: Amah a sawlte tungah a citak kamtai pa pen an lak huna tuivot tawh kibang a, a toteʼ lungsim thaksuaksak hi.
verses.14: Bangmah a piak lohpi a kisialh pih pa pen guah a zusak tuan lo meiipi le huihpi nung tawh kibang lel hi.
verses.15: Lungduai a zolzolna tawh gam ukte kizo thei a, kam nemin pauna tawh aana neite kizo thei hi.
verses.16: Khuaizu na nek ciangin a hoih khop bek zah ne in. Tua hikeileh kham lua-in na lua ding hi.
verses.17: Na veengteʼ inn ah hawh mun lua kei in. Hong cimtakin hong mudah kha ding hi.
verses.18: A lawmteʼ lang khat ah teci man lo a pang mi pen molhtum, namsau, ahih kei leh thal hiam tawh kibang hi.
verses.19: Haksat hunin a zuau tat mi muanin neih khakna pen hana, ahih kei leh khebai tawh kibang hi.
verses.20: A dah a lungkham mipa kiangah lasakna pen khua dam laitakin puan suahkhiat tawh kibang a, meima ci-al nuh tawh kibang hi.
verses.21: Na galte a gil a kial leh an pia inla, a dang a taak leh tui pia in.
verses.22: Tua hileh amauʼ maizum nadingin a bawl na hi a, Topa in nang tungah thaman hong pia ding hi.
verses.23: Leilu lam huih in guah a zuksak bangin gensiatna in hehna piangsak hi.
verses.24: Phun bek a thei zi tawh inn sungah ten khop sangin inn khumzang kiu khat ah tangten hoih zaw tham hi.
verses.25: A dangtak mipa in tuivot lim a sak bangin gamlapi-a om lawmteʼ kiang panin thu zak nuam kisa hi.
verses.26: Mihoih khat in mihoih loteʼ gamtatna a zuih khak ciangin hawktui nin, ahih kei leh tui uih tawh kibang hi.
verses.27: Khuaizu a tam lua nek ding a hoih loh bangin phat ding deih luatna a hoih lo ahi hi.
verses.28: Ama lungsim a ki-uk zo lo mipa pen dalna kulhpi a nei lo khuapi tawh kibang hi.
